{-# LANGUAGE CPP, DeriveDataTypeable, FlexibleContexts,
  GeneralizedNewtypeDeriving, MultiParamTypeClasses,
  TemplateHaskell, TypeFamilies, RecordWildCards #-}

module Persist.Mongo.SlowPull.Types where

import Control.Applicative  ( (<$>) )
import Control.Exception    ( bracket )
import Control.Monad        ( msum )
import Control.Monad.Reader ( ask )
import Control.Monad.State  ( get, put )
import Data.Data            ( Typeable )
import Data.Acid            ( AcidState, Query, Update
                            , makeAcidic, openLocalState )
import Data.Acid.Advanced   ( query', update' )
import Data.Acid.Local      ( createCheckpointAndClose )
import Persist.Mongo.SlowPull.Types.Internal

import Data.SafeCopy        ( base, deriveSafeCopy )

type OffsetCountStore = AcidState OffsetCount

data OffsetCount = OffsetCount { count :: Int }
    deriving (Eq, Ord, Read, Show, Typeable)


incOffsetBy :: Int -> Update OffsetCount Int
incOffsetBy n =
    do c@OffsetCount{..} <- get
       let newCount = count + n
       put $ c { count = newCount }
       return newCount

peekOffset :: Query OffsetCount Int
peekOffset = count <$> ask

initialOffsetCountState :: OffsetCount
initialOffsetCountState = OffsetCount 0

$(deriveSafeCopy 0 'base ''OffsetCount)

$(makeAcidic ''OffsetCount ['incOffsetBy, 'peekOffset])
